subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/I_dont_know-evp.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : My Cat (my best friend) was DOA to the Animal Rescue Leage here in town. IHe was missing for 4 days and on Friday I went to the pound and found that he had been struck by a car (the first night he didn't come home). Severe spinal injury and they had to give him the shot. I asked about him (on the other side)...well seems like they don't have the answers either. Glad tjey heard me though.....maybe he does too. Gonna miss him. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/I_dont_know-evp.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/general.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
